message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value of costs incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver goods and services to customers.

Looking at the income statement, I need to find expenses related to customer acquisition and delivery of goods and services. The most relevant line item would be "Selling Expenses" which typically includes costs related to marketing, sales commissions, advertising, and other costs directly associated with securing customer orders and delivering products or services.

In the provided income statement, I can see:
```
Selling Expenses | 360961.15 | 2024-02-05
```

This line item represents the costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver goods and services to customers.

{"solution": {'value': '360961.15'}}
